title: The Wise Banyan Tree
description: A story about patience, wisdom, and helping others
moral: Patience and wisdom help us grow strong

title: The Little Ant's Big Dream
description: An ant learns that hard work and determination lead to success
moral: Hard work and determination make dreams come true

title: Sharing is Caring
description: Two friends learn the joy of sharing their toys

title: The Honest Woodcutter
description: A woodcutter's honesty is rewarded by a magical river
moral: Honesty is always the best policy

title: The Rainbow Bridge
description: Animals work together to build a bridge across a river
